title: Vignette next to "Artwork and Artist" ("Kunstwerk und Künstler") (headpiece, page 95) from Über das Geistige in der Kunst (Concerning the Spiritual in Art)
medium: Woodcut from an illustrated book with eleven woodcuts
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 1 15/16 x 3 11/16" (5 x 9.4 cm); page: 8 1/4 x 7 1/16" (21 x 18 cm)
